name: Conrad Harrison Youth Center
description: Conrad Harrison Youth Center is one of the most popular places to play pickleball in El Centro, CA. There are 2 indoor wood courts. The lines are permanent, and portable nets are available. A one-time fee is required to play. The facility includes amenities like lights, restrooms, and water.

name: Fountain of Youth Spa and RV Resort
description: Fountain of Youth Spa and RV Resort is a place to play pickleball in Niland, CA. There are 8 outdoor courts. The lines are permanent, but you'll need to bring your own net. A one-time fee is required to play. Players have access to restrooms, water, and wheelchair accessibility.

name: Holtville Recreation Park
description: Holtville Recreation Park is one of the most popular places to play pickleball in Holtville, CA. There are 2 outdoor concrete courts. The lines are permanent, but you'll need to bring your own net. The courts are free. The facility includes amenities like restrooms, water, and lights.

name: Jacques 'n Jills Health Club
description: Come play pickleball at Jacques 'n Jills Health Club in El Centro, CA! There are 2 indoor wood courts. The lines are permanent, and portable nets are available. A membership is required to play. Amenities include food, restrooms, water, and lights.

name: Rio Bend Rv And Golf Resort
description: Rio Bend Rv And Golf Resort is a place to play pickleball in El Centro, CA. There are 4 outdoor hard courts. The lines are permanent, but you'll need to bring your own net. The courts are private. Players have access to restrooms and water.

name: Sunbeam Lake R. V. Resort
description: Sunbeam Lake R. V. Resort is a place to play pickleball in El Centro, CA. There are 3 outdoor concrete courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. The courts are private. The facility includes amenities like restrooms.
